body: Anyone can update Ch.12-13 in English Please.
When I finally have a yaoi moment from the son, it's TOO SHORT! I DEMAND MORE FROM THE SON!

Have any of you actually read any of Bai Asuka's other works before? A lot of them are themed around mother-son incest with the father being of little or no consequence at all. Even the feminization/yaoi at the end isn't all that unusual, especially considering the mangaka occasionally goes as far to include bestiality in his/her stories. If you're not into extreme depravity, then Bai Asuka probably isn't for you.
